def_cn: (通常指因为少雨而)布满灰尘的,满是尘土的
def_en: If places, roads, or other things outside are dusty, they are covered with tiny bits of earth or sand, usually because it has not rained for a long time.

def_cn: (房子、物件等)覆有灰尘的,尘封的
def_en: If a room, house, or object is dusty, it is covered with very small pieces of dirt.
